entry.title: Flush With Cash, Amtrak Embarks on Ambitious Makeover
entry.content: The railroad sees station upgrades as key to doubling ridership by 2040.

entry.title: Children Are Dying in Ill-Prepared Emergency Rooms Across America
entry.content: Hospitals and regulators have done little to ensure E.R.s are ready to treat children in emergencies, while researchers prove taking basic steps can save lives.

entry.title: In U.S. Fights Over Ukraine Aid, Allies Fear Deeper Global Harm
entry.content: Washington has led the response to Russia, but domestic political spats are raising worries about U.S. commitment.
